summary: This is a mod-Pack that regroup some of the best mods out there, Im Allways Scouting mods constantly updated... Have a Look My first mods is in there :)
descriptionHtml:
Hello everyone ! sorry for the inactivity, i was im my Christmas Break i have awsome compilation comming up for you :)

This is My very first mods Be kind give its a shot and Rates Cheers !
Put in the Comments What future Updates you would like to see next !
Look at the files Tabs Be sure to Download all the main files seperatly !

New Version Out First Updates of The ModPack is Out !!
Download Both Main Files Instal Realistic Loot List With NMM then instal BetterHunterProfit same way althoughs if it ask for Updates your gonna have 3 options: Yes, No, Cancel SELECT NO

Hope You injoy This First Version of The ModPackk Arrows and Bows are coming ! :)

- Pelts List Values  -

CaveBearPelt - 750G - 4W
BearPelt - 500G - 4W
BearSnowPelt - 600G - 4W
DeerPelt - 275G - 2W
FoxPelt - 75G - 0.5W
FoxSnowPelt - 125G - 0.5W
SabreCatPelt - 300G - 3.5W
SabreCatSnowPelt - 475G - 3.5W
WereWolfPelt - 1000G - 10W 
(Rare if you dont have any Werewolf Spawn Mods, also found in silverhand Bases)
WolfIcePelt - 150G - 1W
WolfPelt - 100G - 1W

-Hides-
HorseHide - 250G - 2W
GoatHide - 200G - 1W
CowHide - 175G - 2W

Food & Ingredients
---------------------------
Between - 20G to 300G - 0W to 5W

notes
--------
The File is so small so Why not try it Remember to endorse and vote for the mod if you like it and want to see more updates coming up :) 
Take notes that the value are Raw it will decrease when selled ( by how much the merchant like you )

Updates coming up 
-----------------------------
-->Make Realistic Weight for Value Pelts (DONE)
--> Make Hunted animal Food for expensive (DONE)
--> Cooked food even More Expensive (DONE)
--> items comming for animal ( Claws, bones , ect) are more expensive (DONE)
--> Make a ModPacks (WIP)
--> Make Arrows Deadlier (DONE)
--> Make Bow deadlier (DONE)
-->Make a custom loots Drop on animals (DONE)

Credits To the Modder
--------------------------------
Me for changing the vanilla value

Thanks to rohverK 
Realistic Loot List
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25635

Thanks to shadowfx78 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12072/
Help of NottingHillbillie, deadmccoy, FordPerfect
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4456
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8903
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1009

TroubleShoot
--------------------
if your experiencing problems, glitches or bug be sure to post a comment, i will release a fix if so ...
